name: MySQL-CLI
description: execute MySQL queries and scripts via cli.

params.name: connectionString
params.description: Connection string used to connect to the database

params.name: password
params.description: Select password from the Kaholo vault if you don't want to enter it directly into the connection string. If both are provided, a password from Kaholo vault takes precedence

settings.name: mysqlExecutablesPath
settings.description: Alternative absolute path to the directory containing MySQL executables

params.name: sqlFilePath
params.description: Path to the file containing valid SQL query

params.name: databaseName
params.description: Name of the database to dump

params.name: dumpPath
params.description: Path at which the dump file will be saved, make sure the parent directory exists

params.name: includeData
params.description: Include in the dump all of the data from all tables

params.name: dumpDataPath
params.description: Path to the file containing database dump in SQL format
